title: Major Show Announcement
description:
Kirk Minihane announces he's taking a year off after the Wilbur (00:10:00). Some of the most in-depth war talk you'll hear: KFC vs. Gerry Callahan (00:00:30). Chris takes a family vacation to Somerville (00:16:00). The Red Sox release a minor leaguer who's comfortable be called a racist and homophobe (00:38:30). Joy Behar is upset about what's happening in Ukraine because it's impacting her travel plans (00:46:30). We gave Steve's a Liar Guy an insanely difficult task (00:53:00). A show member suffers a devastating personal loss, calls & much more.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/kminshow
dc:creator: Barstool Sports
